mapper.select:
SELECT guid as "guid", customer_code as "customerCode", customer_name as "customerName", product_company as "productCompany", product_code as "productCode", product_Name as "productName", expiring_date as "expiringDate", lic_version as "licVersion", license_code as "licenseCode", license_mode as "licenseMode", signing_date as "signingDate", start_date as "startDate", version_number as "versionNumber", signature as "signature", encrypt_model as "encryptModel", create_time as "createTime" FROM t_sa_licenses
and guid = #{guid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sa_licenses ( guid, customer_code, customer_name, product_company, product_code, product_Name, expiring_date, lic_version, license_code, license_mode, signing_date, start_date, version_number, signature, encrypt_model, create_time ) VALUES ( #{guid}, #{customerCode}, #{customerName}, #{productCompany}, #{productCode}, #{productName}, #{expiringDate}, #{licVersion}, #{licenseCode}, #{licenseMode}, #{signingDate}, #{startDate}, #{versionNumber}, #{signature}, #{encryptModel}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_sa_licenses
guid = #{guid},
customer_code = #{customerCode},
customer_name = #{customerName},
product_company = #{productCompany},
product_code = #{productCode},
product_Name = #{productName},
expiring_date = #{expiringDate},
lic_version = #{licVersion},
license_code = #{licenseCode},
license_mode = #{licenseMode},
signing_date = #{signingDate},
start_date = #{startDate},
version_number = #{versionNumber},
signature = #{signature},
encrypt_model = #{encryptModel},
create_time = #{createTime}
guid = #{guid}
